import React from 'react'; import styles from './PlaceCard.module.css'; const PlaceCard = ({ image, title, rating, location, description, features, price, unit, isFavorite, onToggleFavorite }) => (

{title}

{rating}
{location}

{description}

{features.map((f, idx) => (
{f.text}
))}
${price} per {unit}
); export default PlaceCard;
